# Hardware Kits {.unnumbered}

Welcome to our curated collection of hardware kits designed specifically for machine learning systems education. These kits provide everything you need to get hands-on experience with TinyML and edge AI applications.

## Available Kits {.unnumbered}

### Arduino Nicla Vision Kit
Perfect for computer vision applications and TinyML projects.

- **Included**: Arduino Nicla Vision board, camera module, cables
- **Applications**: Image classification, object detection, keyword spotting
- **Difficulty**: Beginner to Intermediate
- **Labs**: [Nicla Vision Labs](arduino/nicla_vision/nicla_vision.qmd)

### XIAO ESP32S3 Starter Kit  
Versatile microcontroller for vision and audio ML applications.

- **Included**: XIAO ESP32S3 board, expansion board, sensors
- **Applications**: Keyword spotting, motion detection, image classification
- **Difficulty**: Beginner to Intermediate  
- **Labs**: [XIAO ESP32S3 Labs](seeed/xiao_esp32s3/xiao_esp32s3.qmd)

### Raspberry Pi ML Kit
Full-featured platform for advanced ML applications.

- **Included**: Raspberry Pi 4/5, camera, SD card, accessories
- **Applications**: Small language models, vision language models, advanced CV
- **Difficulty**: Intermediate to Advanced
- **Labs**: [Raspberry Pi Labs](raspi/raspi.qmd)

### Grove Vision AI V2 Kit
AI-accelerated vision processing with dedicated NPU.

- **Included**: Grove Vision AI V2 module, camera, Grove connectors
- **Applications**: Real-time object detection, advanced computer vision
- **Difficulty**: Intermediate
- **Labs**: [Grove Vision AI Labs](seeed/grove_vision_ai_v2/grove_vision_ai_v2.qmd)

## Getting Started {.unnumbered}

1. **Choose your kit** based on your experience level and project goals
2. **Follow setup instructions** in the corresponding lab sections
3. **Start with basic examples** before moving to advanced projects
4. **Join our community** for support and project sharing
